title: screen shot of received email message
content: How do I take a screen shot of a received email message? I have a Win 11 PC, updated to most-recent. I tried [shift] [Windows] [S], and selected the portion I want (the entirety), but there seems to be no way to save this so I can send this as an attached file. (I am unable to send it as a forwarded email.)
creator: kirkaby

title: Passwords
content: You need a better way to change passwords both smtp and imap with out being dependent on a prompt. You can change the incoming password with prompt but cant change the outgoing because there is no prompt.
creator: josephreich

title: Unknown message appeared
content:
This message showed up today several times and only when emailing this one person. Does anybody know what this is all about?

Thanks
creator: buzzard2841

title: failing to set up Gmail account
content: I have successfully set up one of my email accounts in Thunderbird, so I know the software works as installed. However when I tried to set up my gmail account, and I get to the sign in with Google popup, I get an error saying that the request cannot be performed because it is "malformed". See attached images.
creator: mkrause

title: illegible text
content:
It went away for a while but now it is back. When I select the text it usually (but not always) resolves. However it is a pain to keep stopping to do that.

I've tried the existing fixes but they either don't work or stop working after applied.
creator: pjcamp
